Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: I dont think he is expecting anything. I think he is just saying widespread adoption won’t happen until those issues are addressed.  Shit needs to get a lot simpler for the average NPC to get on board. Since we all want our lambos, we should realize we probably arent getting those lambos until some of these things happen.

Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: Downloading version after version of buggy wallets, keeping an ear to the ground constantly for every coin/project to protect oneself from delisting/forking issues, using disciplined op-sec protocols... its just too much for your average Starbucks-drinking NPC.

Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: Ugh, and tax compliance. Hopefully the thieves at the IRS will make things a little more straightforward.
